@id.description: Unique identifier in the source system

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system

type.description: Unique feature type id. Refer to [MapsFeatureCatalog](MapsFeatureCatalog.md)

name.description: Name for feature e.g. Paddock, Hazzard, Water Way

crs.description: Coordinate reference system as per GeoJSON

resolution.description: E.g. 25000 indicates 1:25000 scale of a map

bbox.description: Array that is the bounding box coordinates as per GeoJSON

dateCreated.description: ISO8601 date format 2018-07-19T23:00:08+00:00. Date when object was created

dateModified.description: ISO8601 date format 2018-07-19T23:00:08+00:00. Date when details were last modified

datePublished.description: ISO8601 date format 2018-07-19T23:00:08+00:00. Date when details became published

nonSpatialContent.description: URL to get attribute data related to specified type
